name: Enabling Webmention For Comments | Feeding the Bit Bucket
summary:
As you may have noticed, I’m in the middle of revamping my blog. It’s now a
static site, run via Hugo and Cloudflare
Pages. I was planning to use
Disqus for comments, but changed my mind when I realised it meant ads and
tracking. This led to a search for alternatives which ended in choosing
Webmention.
